DOC.brief_summary: This study propose compare effectiveness acceptance-based intervention cognitive control-based intervention cop test anxiety nursing student HESI ( Health Education Systems , Inc. ) examination . Subjects randomize receive either CT ACT condition . In condition , subject receive education test anxiety inform test anxiety occur . Then , different condition receive respective treatment either CT ACT . The study consider minimum risk nursing student expose amount anxiety typical test experience . Both condition meet three time , session last approximately one half hour . The purpose treatment provide subject tool help cope test anxiety .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Acceptance Commitment Therapy ( ACT ) Cognitive Therapy ( CT ) Test Anxiety
DOC.criteria: Nursing student subject may participate currently enrol undergraduate student Drexel University . They must nurse major enrol Nursing 492 intend take cumulative HESI examination . Psychology student must enrol course recruitment occur . Preprofessional student must currently enrol Drexel University , plan take Standardized test within 6 month . All subject must least 18 year age old . Persons may participate unable see/read word computer screen .
